title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Hello, we bring to you our eyeshadow product for make your eyes look with beauty. This is called "Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte." It is a good choice for the eyes because it has color like light taupe-pink, very nice and natural.

This eyeshadow is special because it have good color when you put on skin, called highly pigmented. It is matte type but you can also choose other types like shimmer and metallic if you like shiny. We make it by crème-to-powder formula, so it is soft to put on eye but then become like powder. It will not come off with water because it is waterproof and it will not make line on eye after time, this is called crease proof.

We put good things inside like Vitamin C and E, and Candelilla Wax. These are good for the skin. If your skin is sensitive, it is still ok to use. It can help your skin look better and protect from bad things like sun.

You do not need special tool to use this eyeshadow. It comes with smudger on the end, so you can make the color soft on eye. We tell you to put color with stick, then use smudger or fingers to make nice before it sets.

For the second product, it is same name "Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte." But here, we tell you more details. We have 30 different colors you can choose. It makes skin feel good, give hydration and nourishment. It also help to fix skin from damage and make skin tone and texture better.

It has smudger too, and it is easy to mix the color on eye. You must blend the color before it becomes dry.

The last product is same too, but here we talk about the shade Putty Matte. You can have matte, shimmer, or metallic finish. It has good things for skin like vitamins and wax. You do not need brush to apply. It has built-in smudger for easy use.

We hope you like our eyeshadow and choose it for your beauty needs. Thank you.

Hello Dear Customer,

We have good product for eyes make-up. The name is "Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte". This eyeshadow stick is special because it has many good things for your skin and easy to use.

Color is like light taupe-pink, we say "Putty Matte". It is not shiny, has matte finish. But if you want shiny, we also have Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic options. The stick has color very strong, we call this "Highly Pigmented".

Our formula is like cream when you apply but becomes like powder after. It is good because it does not go into crease of eye, and it does not come off with water. It is "waterproof" and "crease_proof".

We put good things inside for your skin. There is Vitamin C and E and also Candelilla Wax. These make the skin feel good and protect from bad things in air. If your skin is sensitive, it is okay to use this eyeshadow.

You do not need extra tools to put eyeshadow. It has own smudger. You can put color with stick then use smudger or fingers to mix the color on eyelid. But do this fast before eyeshadow becomes like powder.

We hope you like this Julep Eyeshadow Stick. It will make your eyes look very beautiful and is good for your skin too.

Thank you for looking at our product.
